name: DOS (Blacksmith52)
description:
Based off old operating systems from the '80s and '90s.

COMMANDS

☺︎  /echo

    ☻ allows a phrase to be repeated in the CommandLine

☺︎  /cd

    ☻ means "change directory"

    ☻ current files: game.exe , CommandLine , screensaver.exe (broken)

☺︎  /reset

    ☻ clears CommandLine

☺︎ /whoami

    ☻ says who you are

☺︎ /date

    ☻ says the date

☺︎ /time

    ☻ says the time
